title: Fuel for trains available only for three days
content: The Railway Trade Unions stated that the supply of fuel for trains is available for only three days.Secretary of the All Island Private Bus Owners' Association Anjana Priyanjith said that if the required diesel is not provided for buses, all private buses will be out of service within the next three days.State Minister of Transport Dilum Amunugama had stated that a system of supplying diesel to private buses through the SLTB depot will be launched in the next few days.
